Package org.aslib

Interface Auction

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
public interface Auction extends Remote
The Auction interface defines methods for interacting with an auction. It allows bidding, notification, and retrieval of auction details.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description

  • Method Details

    • makeBid

      boolean makeBid(User user, int bid) throws RemoteException
      Places a bid in the auction.
      Parameters:
      user - the user placing the bid
      bid - the bid amount
      Returns:
      true if the bid is successfully placed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs

    • notifyAllBidders

      void notifyAllBidders(String message) throws RemoteException
      Sends a notification message to all bidders.
      Parameters:
      message - the notification message
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs
